title: Jacob Brown
text: I am Jacob Brown, a Data Scientist who enjoys combining analytics and data wrangling with AI and Machine Learning. I also love working with messy datasets and trying to find the hidden gems.

title: Jacob Brown

I am currently working on my Facial Recognition ML model. I’m trying to build a front-end implementation using Streamlit.
I’m currently working on analytics and front-end development with cloud platforms like Azure, Databricks, and AWS.
I am also futher my skills with Bash and JavaScript.
